title: Craved by the Alien Berserker
description: He’s brutal and terrifying, but he would protect me with his life.After Samantha and Raza took care of the Kruul scout, we thought we’d be safe on this new planet. But we were wrong. And when the Kruul who have been hunting us show up en masse and take the Zivonians and the human women captive—only Tyrek and I manage to escape.Tyrek… the savagely fierce alien warrior who makes my heart beat faster, and who seems to be hiding a dark secret. The one I’ve harbored a hidden crush on, even though I have absolutely zero experience with men and have barely been able to muster up the courage to talk to him.Now we’re partners in an insane, suicidal mission to rescue our friends and bring down the Kruul once and for all. And even though everyone has always seen me as innocent and sheltered, I’m determined to show Tyrek that beneath my sweet exterior is a spine of steel.I’ll prove to him that I’m not afraid…Not of the enemies we’ll face.And not of the beast that lurks inside him.Craved by the Alien Berserker is a full-length standalone sci-fi romance featuring a savagely passionate hero and the woman who finds out she’s more than a match for him.If you like sexy aliens, sweeping adventure, and steamy romance, you’ll love this series. No cheating, no cliffhanger, and a happily ever after guaranteed! each book in the series can be read as a standalone, but for maximum enjoyment, it’s recommended that the series be read in order.
author: Presley Hall
